author: andschwa

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: A [prototype](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/18) xUnit runner for dotnet-cli has been implemented.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Cannot get even the sample code to run with xunit. Left a comment on: https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/18 with my repro steps and various troubleshooting steps.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Update: we're still waiting on .NET team to release the new package.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Update: we found the secret feed with the package, working on integrating in #545.

title: Fix dotnet-test to run xUnit tests
